general.description: Naga is a purely aquatic planet. The land closest to the surface is under more than a mile of water, which can make landing quite tricky for inexperienced pilots. The planet is teeming with life of mind-boggling variety and type. The planets scientific and aesthetic value makes it one of the most favoured Za'lek worlds.
general.bar: This bar is built on one of the upper decks of the underwater cities, with the entire ceiling being a window out into Naga's oceans. With intense lighting attracting all sorts of subaquatic life, the sight is nothing short of breathtaking.
